find derivatives
```{r}

my_derivative <- D(expr = expression(x^2), name = "x")
my_derivative

x <- 3
eval(my_derivative)

my_derivative <- D(expr = expression(2*(3*x+2)^4-5), name = "x")
my_derivative

x <- 1.2
eval(my_derivative)

```
